content:
Craft an item of type: granite_slab
inventory=[{"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 20, "index": 10}, {"type": "crossbow", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "phantom_spawn_egg", "quantity": 12, "index": 17}, {"type": "smooth_sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 59, "index": 22}, {"type": "granite", "quantity": 3, "index": 25}, {"type": "white_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "acacia_fence_gate", "quantity": 26, "index": 27}, {"type": "infested_stone_bricks", "quantity": 10, "index": 28}, {"type": "pufferfish_spawn_egg", "quantity": 28, "index": 29}, {"type": "bone", "quantity": 26, "index": 32}, {"type": "blue_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "glass_pane", "quantity": 17, "index": 34}, {"type": "lime_banner", "quantity": 6, "index": 35}, {"type": "mule_spawn_egg", "quantity": 59, "index": 36}, {"type": "ice", "quantity": 36, "index": 38}, {"type": "emerald", "quantity": 63, "index": 40}, {"type": "cobblestone_slab", "quantity": 22, "index": 41}]
thought: To craft a granite_slab, I need to place 3 granite blocks in a row in the crafting grid. The first block can be placed in slot 1, so I will move the granite from slot 25 to slot 1.
act: move from slot 25 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: granite_slab

thought: Next, I will move the second granite block from slot 25 to slot 2.
act: move from slot 25 to slot 2 with quantity 1

act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 6
